events.message: I recently received my order but would like to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
Ticket automatically categorized as Refund due to customer's request for money back.
Support agent Sarah assigned to handle the refund request case for this customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you also let me know why you want to return the product and if it was opened or used?
My order number is 789456123. The item was opened but not used because it was not what I expected from the description.
Thank you for the details. We can process your refund once we receive the returned item. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for your quick response and help. I appreciate the return label and will send the product back within the next two days.
We have received your returned product and processed your refund. The amount will reflect in your account in 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to make sure you have received your refund and if you have any further questions or concerns.
We are closing this case as your refund has been processed successfully. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
